Package gabrielLopes.project2425.DevPackage.QuickFixApp.Utils

Class ProfilePicHandler

java.lang.Object
gabrielLopes.project2425.DevPackage.QuickFixApp.Utils.ProfilePicHandler
public class ProfilePicHandler extends Object
Utility class for handling profile picture selection, upload, and loading.

  • Method Details

    • getProfilePicture

      public static void getProfilePicture(android.app.Activity activity, int userId, android.widget.ImageView imageView)
      Downloads and loads a user's profile picture into an ImageView using Glide.

      Glide prevents UI lag and avoids memory leaks by handling image decoding and recycling internally.

      Parameters:
      activity - The current activity context.
      userId - ID of the user whose picture should be loaded.
      imageView - ImageView to update.

    • uploadProfilePicture

      public static void uploadProfilePicture(android.app.Activity activity, android.net.Uri imageUri, android.widget.ImageView profileImageView, ProfilePicHandler.UploadCallback callback)
      Uploads a selected image URI to the server as the new profile picture.

      Glide ensures smooth image transitions, handles disk and memory caching, and avoids unnecessary reloads.

      Parameters:
      activity - The current activity.
      imageUri - The URI of the selected image.
      profileImageView - ImageView to update after successful upload.
      callback - Optional callback to notify success/failure.

    • startImagePicker

      public static void startImagePicker(android.app.Activity activity, androidx.activity.result.ActivityResultLauncher<android.content.Intent> launcher)
      Launches the image picker to select a profile picture.
      Parameters:
      activity - The current activity context.
      launcher - The result launcher to handle the result.

    • handleImagePickerResult

      public static void handleImagePickerResult(android.app.Activity activity, androidx.activity.result.ActivityResult result, android.widget.ImageView profileImageView, ProfilePicHandler.UploadCallback callback)
      Handles the result of the image picker and initiates upload if successful.
      Parameters:
      activity - The current activity.
      result - The result returned from the image picker.
      profileImageView - ImageView to update on success.
      callback - Callback to notify upload result.

    • createTempFileFromUri

      public static File createTempFileFromUri(android.content.Context context, android.net.Uri uri) throws IOException
      Converts a content URI to a temporary File in the cache directory.
      Parameters:
      context - The context for accessing content resolver and cache.
      uri - The URI of the image to convert.
      Returns:
      A temporary File object created from the image URI.
      Throws:
      IOException - If reading or writing the file fails.
